blogPost.excerpt: Vectornator is the best vector graphics software available for the Apple ecosystem. The 4.0 update brings a complete Mac UI Redesign, SF Symbols, Quick Settings, and more! Use Quick Actions to work up to 30% faster!
blogPost.body: Vectornator is the best vector graphics software available for the Apple ecosystem. The 4.0 update brings a complete Mac UI Redesign, SF Symbols, Quick Settings, and more! Use Quick Actions to work up to 30% faster!
blogPost.title: Vectornator 4.0 - The most Intuitive and Precise Illustration Software.
blogPost.author: Vlad Shvets

localize.description: Vectornator是苹果生态系统中最好的矢量图形软件。4.0更新带来了完整的Mac用户界面重新设计，SF符号，快速设置等! 使用快速操作，工作速度可提高30%!
localize.tagline: 最直观、最精准的插画软件。

localize.description: Vectornator是蘋果生態系統中最好的矢量圖形軟件。4.0更新帶來了完整的Mac用戶界面重新設計，SF符號，快速設置等! 使用快速操作，工作速度可提高30%!
localize.tagline: 最直觀、最精準的插畫軟件。
